short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a tip to online prices

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A fun tool to help you read menus online with the tip included.  Choose your preferred tip rate, then refresh the page to see the prices reflect the real cost of the menu.  The App works with Dollars, Euros and Pound Sterling.
